title: Creative T12 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker System
description: Future proof your desktop with wired and wireless options from the Creative T12 Wireless, now with Bluetooth wireless technology and apt-X audio codec from the award winning Inspire S2 Wireless. Indulge in true seamless, high performance low latency wireless audio streaming with compatible stereo Bluetooth devices. Built with BassFlex technology, it extends the lower frequencies to improve bass, giving you a richer audio experience. The Creative T12 Wireless is an excellent high performing compact speaker system with wired line-in and wireless stereo Bluetooth for your computer, laptop, mobile devices and other Bluetooth enabled devices. A front mounted headphone jack ensures easy access for private listening promptly.
